verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Zacharias, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* Casleu.

\w When|strong="H7971"\w* Sarasar, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Rogommelech, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w entreat|strong="H2470"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w To|strong="H0413"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: Must \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* must \w I|strong="H0834"\w* sanctify myself \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w now|strong="H2088"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* month \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: did \w you|strong="H3588"\w* keep \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H0859"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H0859"\w*?

\w Are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w these|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1697"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* wealthy, both itself \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* towards \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* plain?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Zacharias, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Judge|strong="H8199"\w* ye \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shew ye \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7356"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3513"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* would not hearken, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* away \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* depart: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* \w stopped|strong="H3513"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, not \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* adamant \w stone|strong="H0834"\w*, lest \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*: \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* indignation \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* dispersed \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* kingdoms, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* changed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* delightful \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* wilderness.
